 test11
--------
Layer             : II  
Protection        : yes
Bitrate base      : 384000
Sampling rate     : 44.1 kHz
Private bit       : 0
Mode              : stereo
Copyright         : no
Original          : yes
Emphasis          : none (flat)

Configuration     : 3/2.0
Extension         : no
Bitrate extension : not applicable
Matrix procedure  : 2
Dynamic crosstalk : no
Phantom centre    : no
Prediction        : no
Multilingual      : no
Multilingual fs   : not applicable

Ancillary data    : none

Nr. of frames     : 27
Test signal       : composed of music signals;
                    3 different mono signals (l,c,r) plus 
                    2-channel stereo signal (ls,rs)
Files             : test11.mpg
                    test11_l.pcm   (16 bit/sample)
                    test11_r.pcm   (16 bit/sample)
                    test11_c.pcm   (16 bit/sample)
                    test11_ls.pcm  (16 bit/sample)
                    test11_rs.pcm  (16 bit/sample)
                    test11.info
